help.short: The name of the Firewall Policy.
The name of the Firewall Policy Rule Collection Group.

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the Firewall Policy.
The name of the Firewall Policy Rule Collection Group.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ruleCollections" options="rule-collections" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@FirewallPolicyRule_create>" var="$parameters.properties.ruleCollections[].FirewallPolicyFilterRuleCollection.rules" options="rules">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ruleCollections[].FirewallPolicyNatRuleCollection.rules" options="rules">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.destinationAddresses" options="destination-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.fqdnTags" options="fqdn-tags">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.httpHeadersToInsert" options="http-headers-to-insert">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.protocols" options="protocols">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.sourceAddresses" options="source-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.sourceIpGroups" options="source-ip-groups">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.targetFqdns" options="target-fqdns">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.targetUrls" options="target-urls">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.ApplicationRule.webCategories" options="web-categories">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NatRule.destinationAddresses" options="destination-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NatRule.destinationPorts" options="destination-ports">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NatRule.ipProtocols" options="ip-protocols">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NatRule.sourceAddresses" options="source-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NatRule.sourceIpGroups" options="source-ip-groups">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NetworkRule.destinationAddresses" options="destination-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NetworkRule.destinationFqdns" options="destination-fqdns">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NetworkRule.destinationIpGroups" options="destination-ip-groups">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NetworkRule.destinationPorts" options="destination-ports">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NetworkRule.ipProtocols" options="ip-protocols">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NetworkRule.sourceAddresses" options="source-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@FirewallPolicyRule_create.NetworkRule.sourceIpGroups" options="source-ip-groups">
